Title: A Wolf Among Sheep
Description:
Thank you for indulging me. 

But I do not want to appear unappreciative of our new... mentor. Do me a favor--go and fill Madam Shadow's soulstone by some other means. Far be it for us to test our teacher, but she has yet to earn my trust.
ObjectivesText: Help Oman fill Madam Shadow's soulstone on Darkmoon Island.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Madam Shadow in the Darkmoon Faire.

Objectives.Text: Dummy soulstone created for Madam Shadow
